text: Ara yadi emana ekakhana kura'ana thakata yara dbara paharagulo hatiye deya yeto, athaba tara dbara prthibike chinnabhinna kara yeto, athaba mrtake tara dbara katha balano yeto. Ara yara abisbasa posana kare tara ya kare sejan'ya tadera upare biparyaya aghata hanate ksanta habe na, athaba eti tadera barigharera nikate'i apatita hate thakabe, ye paryanta na allahâ€Œra oyada samagata haya.
